pc_heading: HERE'S WHY WE ARE THE BEST OUT THERE
free_shipping_msg: Not only do we offer free shipping, we also offer fast shipping. Most orders get delivered to customers within 2 business days.
guaranteed_cover_msg: ALL covers are manufactured to fit perfectly on each vehicle.
return_policy_msg: Not satisfied with your cover? Hassle-Free returns within 30 days of purchase offered on all orders.
